item.title: Problem with auto donate -martains tut. help!
item.dc:creator: @nikkisere nikkisere
item.description:
@nikkisere wrote:

here is my main method in server.java

public static void main(java.lang.String args[]) throws NullPointerException, IOException { Runtime.getRuntime().addShutdownHook(new Thread() { public void run() { for(Player p : PlayerHandler.players) { if(p == null) continue; System.out.println("Saving all players..."); PlayerSave.saveGame((Client)p); } } }); try { WalkingHandler.getSingleton().initialize(); } catch(Exception ex) { ex.printStackTrace(); md = new MadTurnipConnection(); md.start();

the

md = new MadTurnipConnection();
md.start();

causes 2 errors

src\server\Server.java:122: error: cannot find symbol md = new MadTurnipConnection(); ^ symbol: variable md location: class Server src\server\Server.java:123: error: cannot find symbol md.start(); ^ symbol: variable md location: class Server

any ideas?

Read full topic
